name: Laptop
description: Powerful laptop with a quad-core i5 processor, 8GB RAM, 256GB SSD, and a 14-inch FHD display. Wireless mouse and keyboard also provided with gurantey.

name: iPhone 13
description: Latest iPhone model with A15 Bionic chip, Super Retina XDR display, and advanced camera system.

name: Wireless Headphones
description: High-quality wireless headphones with noise cancellation and long battery life.

name: Smartwatch
description: Feature-packed smartwatch with heart rate monitoring, GPS, waterproof, antirust resistant and fitness tracking.

name: Bluetooth Speaker
description: Portable Bluetooth speaker with powerful sound and waterproof design. Easy to carry and customize with different features

name: Mobile Phone
description: Flagship mobile phone with high-resolution display, advanced camera system.

name: Smart TV
description: 4K Ultra HD smart TV with HDR support, built-in streaming apps, and voice control. Easy to carry and 2 years warranty with high-resolution display.

name: TV
description: This television will be soon available to public in poudel store. Right now, it is only available to our preminum members only.
